txt.en: Earn the Favour of Mord√≠rith from special daily quests during the reward track season to earn new cosmetics, skins, and items for your Monster Player characters and currency used by both your Monster Player Characters and Free People Characters to enhance their strength in the Ettenmoors. Any of your Monster Player characters in this world help to advance this track and can claim rewards from it. This reward track is only available for a limited time!
